question: What is the length of Chenani-Nashri Tunnel?
explanation: Chenani-Nashri Tunnel is the longest road tunnel in India. It is located in Jammu and Kashmir on National Highways 44. The length of Chenani- Nashri Tunnel is 9.87 km.Â Chenani - Nashri Tunnel has been renamed as Dr. Syama Prasad Mookerjee Tunnel.
